name: SOUND ON
description:
This game has been created for the GGJ 2022, where i had the role of Game Developer, Level Designer and Project Manager.

The game jam theme was “duality” and Sound On is a Rhythmic, adventure, 3D game that underlines the duality between adults and children’s world through Tommy’s eyes.

Tommy is an 11 year old boy who dreams of becoming a guitarist. After a quarrel with his parents, who did not support his dream, he dreamed of changing the way adults see the world, always dull and monotonous, giving them carelessness and instinctiveness.
